casebody.data:
Imari Abubakari OBADELE and Kuratibisha X Ali Rashid, Plaintiffs-Appellants, and Kalonji Tor OLUSEGUN, Plaintiff, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-5134. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 11, 2003.

Before CLEVENGER, SCHALL, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
